# Social Image Preview

Recommended: 1280x640px PNG with VR scene showcasing AI capabilities

## Description

A VR tourism scene showcasing AI capabilities:

**Center (VR Environment):**
- Immesive 3D virtual destination (ancient temple, modern city, or natural landscape)
- Rich architectural details and atmospheric lighting

**Left Side (AI Tour Guide Interface):**
- Chat conversation UI with message history
- Shows typing indicators for AI responses
- Displays "ü§ñ AI Ready" status indicator
- Natural language message bubbles

**Right Side (AI Capabilities):**
- Natural Language Understanding üí¨

**Style:**
- Clean, modern, futuristic with depth
- Dark blue gradient background (#1a1a2e to #0f3460) with bright UI elements
- "TripMeta" logo and tagline visible
- Technological yet welcoming, innovative AI experience

**Branding:**
- "TripMeta" logo clearly visible
- Tagline: "AI-Powered Virtual Tourism"

**Vibe:**
- Technological yet welcoming
- Innovative AI experience
- Accessible and professional

## Creating an Image

### Option 1: Generate with AI

Use DALL-E 3 or Midjourney with prompt:
```
VR tourism screenshot, 1280x640, showing virtual travel destination with AI tour guide interface, modern dark blue gradient colors (#1a1a2e to #0f3460), TripMeta logo, clean UI design, futuristic yet accessible
```

### Option 2: Capture from Unity

1. Open TripMeta project in Unity
2. Setup a nice scene with lighting
3. Position camera for good composition
4. Capture at 1280x640 or higher resolution
5. Add text overlays in image editor
6. Export as PNG

## Social Preview

When your repository is shared on:
- **Twitter/X** - Shows image with full description
- **LinkedIn** - Shows image in professional feed
- **Discord** - Shows image when link is expanded
- **Facebook** - Shows image with open graph preview

**Best Practices:**
- Include a clear "AI" or "VR" element in image
- Show actual interface, not just concept art
- Ensure text is readable at small sizes
- Add TripMeta branding if possible

## Image Requirements

| Aspect | Specification |
|--------|-------------|
| **Size** | 1280x640 pixels minimum |
| **Format** | PNG or JPG |
| **Content** | VR scene screenshot, AI interface, or 3D attraction |
| **Style** | Show, don't just tell - Include VR headset or UI |
| **Text** | Minimal text, large and readable |
| **Colors** | Match brand colors (gradient) |
| **Vibe** | Technological yet welcoming, futuristic but accessible |
